author: Mary Carolan
title: High Court orders detention of brain-injured woman in nursing home
description: Judge says he is satisfied woman’s health is best served by leaving her where she is for now
content:
A brain-injured woman is to be detained in a nursing home by High Court order because of concerns about the quality of care in her own home and concerns that her husband may seek to have her discharged back there once Covid-19 restrictions are lifted. 
There… [+2993 chars]
